data.name: AutofireHelp1
data.value: Hold Select + A/B for one second to toggle turbo A/B

data.name: CustomKernelQ
data.value: Do you want to flash the custom kernel?

data.name: CustomWarning
data.value: Now you need to flash a custom kernel to your NES Mini. This is only required once. Continue?

data.name: DeleteElement
data.value: Do you really want to delete "{0}"?

data.name: DeleteElements
data.value: Do you really want to delete {0} element(s)?

data.name: DeleteGame
data.value: Do you really want to delete "{0}"?

data.name: DeletePreset
data.value: Do you really want to delete preset "{0}"?

data.name: DeleteSavesQ
data.value: Do you really want to delete these savestates?

data.name: DoYouWantCancel
data.value: Do you want to cancel the current operation?

data.name: Donate
data.value: P.S. If you want, you can donate to me. You can find my PayPal in the "About" section.

data.name: DoneYouCanUpload
data.value: Done! You can now upload games to your NES Mini.

data.name: DownloadAllCoversTitle
data.value: Downloading box art for all games (I'm feeling lucky!)

data.name: DumpKernelQ
data.value: Do you want to dump the kernel?

data.name: ExtraArgsInfo
data.value: You can add global command-line arguments which will be applied to all games, including the original 30. Experts only!

data.name: FirstRun
data.value: Hello there! I'm very happy that you're using hakchi2. It's very simple to use. Just click "Add more games", select some ROMs, click "Synchronise" and follow the instructions. Good luck!

data.name: FolderContent
data.value: Deleted content will be moved to the Recycle Bin. You can delete this folder permanently or move the games to other folders.

data.name: FoldersSaveQ
data.value: Do you want to save this folder structure?

data.name: FourScreenNotSupported
data.value: Sorry, {0} uses four-screen mode (the game had additional VRAM in the cartridge), and this feature is not supported by the NES Mini. The game will probably not start. It should work if a different emulator module is installed. Do you want to add this game anyway?

data.name: GGCodeDelete
data.value: Do you really want to delete "{0}"?

data.name: GGCodeEmpty
data.value: You have to enter a code!

data.name: GGCodeExists
data.value: This code already exists. Do you want to edit it?

data.name: GGDescriptionEmpty
data.value: You have to enter a description!

data.name: GameGenieFormatError
data.value: "{0}" is an invalid Game Genie code for "{1}".

data.name: GameGenieNotFound
data.value: Can't apply "{0}" to "{1}" - value not found. Are you sure this code isn't for another game?

data.name: InputPreset
data.value: Please input a name for the current selection.

data.name: KernelDumped
data.value: Your factory kernel has been saved in the ~\hakchi2\dump\ folder. Do not lose it.

data.name: MD5Failed
data.value: Kernel dumped but the MD5 checksum is unknown:

data.name: MD5Failed2
data.value: The kernel is already patcher, or it's an unknown revision. Please send this message to me (press Ctrl+C). Continue at your own risk.

data.name: MapperNotSupported
data.value: Sorry, "{0}" uses mapper #{1}, which is not supported by the NES Mini's built in emulator. However, it will probably work with external emulator mods. Continue?

data.name: MemoryFull
data.value: Sorry, these games take up {0} megabytes. The max is ~300.

data.name: MemoryStats
data.value: Total writable memory size: {0:F1} megabytes|Available memory for games: {1:F1} megabytes|Used by saves: {2:F1} megabytes|Used by other files: {3:F1} megabytes

data.name: NewGamesUnsorted
data.value: New games are in the "Unsorted" folder.

data.name: NoKernelWarning
data.value: First, dump the kernel image of your NES Mini. You only need to do this once. Continue?

data.name: NoKernelYouNeed
data.value: No kernel dump found. Please dump the kernel from your NES Mini first.

data.name: NoTelnet
data.value: Can't start Telnet client, it looks like it's disabled. You need to enable it before you can use it - go to "Control Panel" -> "Programs" -> "Turn Windows features on or off".

data.name: OriginalKernelQ
data.value: Do you want to flash the factory kernel?

data.name: PatchQ
data.value: There is a patch for "{0}". Do you want to apply it?

data.name: PleaseTryAgainUSB
data.value: If this problem persists, try using another USB port or cable.

data.name: ReplaceKernelQ
data.value: You already have a kernel dump. If you REALLY want to replace the backup of your kernel and you ACTUALLY know what you are doing, delete the "hakchi2\dump" folder manually.

data.name: SelectModsInstall
data.value: Select modules to install to your NES Mini

data.name: SelectModsUninstall
data.value: Select modules to remove from your NES Mini

data.name: UninstallFactoryNote
data.value: Don't forget to perform a factory reset it you want to delete all Suspend Points.

data.name: UninstallQ1
data.value: Dou you really want to remove all traces of hakchi2 and return your NES Mini to its factory state?

data.name: UninstallQ2
data.value: Done, wait until the POWER LED goes out. You also need to flash the factory kernel. Flash the factory kernel now?
